column5: Hey all. I was just wondering what is happening and when the tournament starts up again or what. It was a blast last year and can't wait for this year.
yes it seemed like a fun time and i have never participated and would love to this year aswell !
Started a thread last week with minimal response. http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=60206&st=0&p=663121&hl=OFC%20Tourny&fromsearch=1entry663121

There is a fairly lengthy discussion  in the 2011 forum regarding ideas for the 2012 options. For those who haven't visited this conversation, or arent aware Slowpoke is stepping down as the lead on this role due to time restrictions.  I know I'm up for participation in the 2012 competition, in whatever shape or form it ends up in.
Ill be a Team Captain again!
